channel.title: ss on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in ss on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Great lesson yesterday
item.description: 10:35 Wednesday 18 May 2016 JST Had a great lesson with SS yesterday

item.title: best lesson ever
item.description: 11:38 Tuesday 10 May 2016 JST Wow I just had the best lesson ever with SS. I reviewed “it’s a thing that ______” and then got a fake phone call on a hollow tube. "Hello?" "Oh hey what's up?" "Yeah sorry I'm ______-ing right now" "Okay bye" I then gave out a paper with 11 action images on it, including 4 screenshots of SS members performing. I went through the vocab.

item.title: Great lesson with SS today
item.description: 12:03 Tuesday 19 April 2016 JST Today was my fifth lesson with SS, and it seemed like they enjoyed it. I’m really trying hard to use the techniques I’m learning in my TESOL class online, and it really seems to work! This week we continued with the vocab words I presented last week. We didn’t quite finish the exercise, so I said we’ll continue next week.. I hope that works out!

item.title: today
item.description: 11:35 Thursday 24 March 2016 JST Lesson this morning was short because my student was late as usual. I spoke with Matt on the way out of the building; told him that I’m teaching the SS lessons starting soon. Online i-group started an hour earlier due to US clocks springing forward so I was a tiny bit late for that. Now I’m about to work on AB site.
